sentences.english: A guide to the structure and architecture of an Android Application.
sentences.chinese: Android应用程序结构及体系的指南。

sentences.english: China Adult Constitute Standard Guide has certain applicative value.
sentences.chinese: 《中国成年人体质测定标准指南》具有应用价值。

sentences.english: You can find more information from the Service Directory in your room .
sentences.chinese: 您可以从您房间的服务指南中了解更多的资料。

sentences.english: In the meantime, most of the kinks have been worked out.
sentences.chinese: 与此同时，操作指南的大部分内容也已经做出来了。

sentences.english: In this article we provide you with some common sense guidelines for setting your own portal governance strategy.
sentences.chinese: 本文将向您介绍设置门户管理策略的一些常识性指南。

sentences.english: But are there any general guidelines for how long it takes before behaviours become automatic?
sentences.chinese: 但在行为成为自动性前有什么普遍的指南吗？

sentences.english: A simple compass is helpful for scribing the flowerpot cutouts.
sentences.chinese: 一个简单的指南针，是有助于划线的花盆切口。

sentences.english: This article provides a quick-reference guide for the new functionality offered in the technical preview.
sentences.chinese: 本文提供了技术预览版新功能的快速参考指南。

sentences.english: "When I've played I think I've done well, " he said, speaking to United's matchday programme.
sentences.chinese: “我觉得踢得不错，”他在曼联的观赛指南中说。

sentences.english: USDA guidelines recommend three ounces or more of whole grains per day.
sentences.chinese: USDA指南中建议每天使用三盎司以上全谷类食品。

sentences.english: The Medication Guide will be considered to be an element of the REMS.
sentences.chinese: 用药指南将被视为一个新的要素。

sentences.english: The Compass is also manufactured in Brazil and will furthermore be manufactured in Mexico and India.
sentences.chinese: 指南者也在巴西生产，并将扩展到墨西哥与印度制造。

sentences.english: The guide is available in PDF format for immediate download online.
sentences.chinese: 该指南以PDF格式提供，可直接在线下载。

sentences.english: South-pointing Cart is a mechanic directional device used in ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 指南车是中国古代的一种机械定向装置。

sentences.english: What kind of guidelines for low-income countries more appropriate?
sentences.chinese: 对于低收入国家哪种指南更合适？

sentences.english: Buy a tutorial book to get you started and learn from there.
sentences.chinese: 买一本指南书，指导你开始学习。
